# `ConversationContentRichLink` Definition

A Rich Link attachment

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| header | [`ConversationContentRichLinkHeader`](conversationcontentrichlinkheader-definition.md) | No | Header for the Rich Link. |
| footer | `string` | No | Footer text for the Rich Link. |
| text | `string` | Yes | Text for the body of the Rich Link. |
| urlLabel | `string` | No | Label for the URL of the Rich Link. |
| url | `string` | Yes | Url for the Rich Link. |
